Keywords: Animal , Arakko , Horsemen
Real Name: Unknown
Special Powers
(+5 POINTS) SWORD BEARER: This character starts the game with any Sword equipment equipped.
THE FIRST CHILDREN: At the beginning of the game, if your starting force has two or more characters with the Horsemen keyword, this game Death has: "Steal Energy, but with close or range attacks." // If a friendly character named Apocalypse, Annihilation, or Genesis is on your force, modify Death's attack and defense +1.
WE SHALL LITTER THE PATH WITH THEIR BODIES!: When Death damages an opposing character with an attack, after resolutions deal that character 1 unavoidable damage. If that character is not KO'd, immediately heal them 1 click.

Comments
September 30, 2022
tidge
Lil' Death (the lower cost starting line) may be the one figure that I actually consider assigning the OP version of the Muramasa blade for +5 points, as Death's special attack power is the only way I can guarantee that an opponent will ever use "healing" during a game (triggering the immediate use of the CURSE token). Obviously this trick also works for the higher cost dial, but with the higher natural damage value and more clicks of the special attack power a different offensive sword option (Sword of Might, Pogg ur-Pogg) could be more useful. As for the dial itself, I really like this piece for 45 points. Obviously it's much improved when equipped with a Sword, and when joined by "First Family" members.
